languages.text: Set Veil fracture to 20, kill the raven and summon 4 random demons in its place. Those demons attack everyone except each other

traits.locale_text: Set Veil fracture to 20, kill the raven and summon 4 random demons in its place. Those demons attack everyone except each other

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} becomes 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack each creature in combat, except each other.
{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.
{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Истончение завесы{/g} становится равным 20. Псайберворон деактивируется, и на его месте появляется 4 случайных демона. Они атакуют всех существ в бою, исключая друг друга.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} becomes 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack each creature in combat, except each other.

{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Истончение завесы{/g} становится равным 20. Псайберворон деактивируется, и на его месте появляется 4 случайных демона. Они атакуют всех существ в бою, исключая друг друга.

{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Истончение завесы{/g} становится равным 20. Псайберворон деактивируется, и на его месте появляется 4 случайных демона. Они атакуют всех существ в бою, исключая друг друга.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が20になる。サイバーレイヴンは無効化され、ランダムなデーモンが4体出現する。デーモンは互いを除く戦闘中のすべての生物を攻撃する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} becomes 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack each creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が20になる。サイバーレイヴンは無効化され、ランダムなデーモンが4体出現する。デーモンは互いを除く戦闘中のすべての生物を攻撃する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} ändert sich auf 20. Der Psitech-Rabe wird deaktiviert und 4 zufällige Dämonen nehmen seinen Platz ein. Sie attackieren alle am Kampf beteiligten Kreaturen außer sich selbst.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} ändert sich auf 20. Der Psitech-Rabe wird deaktiviert und 4 zufällige Dämonen nehmen seinen Platz ein. Sie attackieren alle am Kampf beteiligten Kreaturen außer sich selbst.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Örtü bozulması{/g} 20'ye eşitlenir. Ruhsiber kuzgun devre dışı kalır ve yerine rastgele 4 iblis belirir. Birbirleri hariç, çatışmadaki her yaratığa saldırırlar.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Örtü bozulması{/g} 20'ye eşitlenir. Ruhsiber kuzgun devre dışı kalır ve yerine rastgele 4 iblis belirir. Birbirleri hariç, çatışmadaki her yaratığa saldırırlar.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} passe à 20. La psyber-corneille est désactivée et 4 démons aléatoires apparaissent à sa place. Ils attaquent toutes les créatures en combat, sauf eux-mêmes.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} passe à 20. La psyber-corneille est désactivée et 4 démons aléatoires apparaissent à sa place. Ils attaquent toutes les créatures en combat, sauf eux-mêmes.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} cambia a 20. El psicocuervo queda inactivo, y en su lugar aparecen 4 daemons aleatorios que atacan a todas las criaturas presentes en el combate (excepto unos a otros).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} cambia a 20. El psicocuervo queda inactivo, y en su lugar aparecen 4 daemons aleatorios que atacan a todas las criaturas presentes en el combate (excepto unos a otros).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度变为20点，生化渡鸦停止运作。随后，4只随机恶魔出现在生化渡鸦所在位置。这些恶魔会无差别攻击战场上的所有生物，但不会自相残杀。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 20. The psyber-raven is deactivated, and 4 random daemons appear in their place. They attack every creature in combat, except each other.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度变为20点，生化渡鸦停止运作。随后，4只随机恶魔出现在生化渡鸦所在位置。这些恶魔会无差别攻击战场上的所有生物，但不会自相残杀。
